name: MalFunction (itch) (smiller77) (smiller77)
description:
In this top-down shooter, your active weapon changes every time you use it.

The icons above your head indicate your current and next weapons. 

Survive four waves of enemies to beat the game!

Made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.

C o n t r o l s

Use WASD to move around

Left click to use your active equipment

W e a p o n s

Shotgun: short-range burst attack

Laser: long-range attack that pierces enemies

Bomb: releases an AOE attack shortly after placing

Net: slows enemies down when they walk over it

Teleporter: instantly teleport to where it hits; resets your weapon cooldown
